task.title: Applying Partial Payments to an Invoice
task.abstract: Staff users can apply partial payments to an invoice in order to meet their organization's current needs.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Invoicetab within the eBusiness application.

choices.choice: Alternatively, search for the invoice number or contact/account in the Global Search Bar. Select the name of the person or organization in the Customer Account field. Select the invoice that requires payment in the Invoice related list. Click the Apply Payment button.

step.cmd: In the View picklist, select the invoices with a status of Posted and click the Go button.
Select the invoice that requires payment and click the Apply Payment button.
Enter the amount to be paid in the Items Total field. Click Process Payment.
Select payment method and enter the required values. Select the Save checkbox to save payment information.
Click the Pay button to apply a partial payment to the selected invoice.

result.p: The associated Sales Order record updates the ePayment and the Receipt transaction history following the partial payment. The total amount due on the invoice is updated to reflect the remaining balance.
